text: Kananjalo uAll√¢h Wenza (omnye) umzekeliso wamadoda amabini, enye kuwo isisimumu, ayinagunya phezu kwayo nantoni na, yaye ingumthwalo nakumgcini wayo; nantoni na ayikhombisa yona (ukuba iyenze), akukho nto intle iza nayo. Ingaba indoda enjalo iyafana (nendoda) eyalela ukwenziwa kobulungisa, ibe kwayona iseNdleleni ethe Tye
